description:
The Wii Balance Board Device Enabler for LabChart facilitates communication between a Nintendo Wii Balance Board and LabChart over a wireless Bluetooth connection.

The Wii Balance Board Device Enabler for LabChart facilitates communication between a Nintendo Wii Balance Board and LabChart over a wireless Bluetooth connection. Data from four load sensors within the board can be streamed into LabChart with each sensor's data mapped to a separate LabChart channel. Combining channel data in LabChart allows for measurements such as a person's weight or center of balance.
Changes Since Previous Version
There have been various enhancements and changes to the following:
- Sampling with the Wii Balance Board no longer requires a PowerLab to be connected and turned on
- The displayed device name of the Wii Balance Board has been improved.
